verse: The Lord told me, “Go and buy a pair of linen shorts. Wear them for a while, but don’t wash them.”
So I bought a pair of shorts and put them on.
“Take off the shorts. Go to Parah and hide the shorts in a crack between some large rocks.”
Some time later the Lord said, “Go back and get the shorts.”
I went back and dug the shorts out of their hiding place, but the cloth had rotted, and the shorts were ruined.
Jeremiah, tell the people of Judah, “The Lord God of Israel orders you to fill your wine jars with wine.”

header: The People of Judah Will Be Taken Away
